                      android.widget.ListView parent,
                      java.lang.String userEmail,
                      android.content.Context argContext)
        When instantiated it will change the displayed books
        Parameters:
        argBookList - array adapter responsible for the view of a single book in a list
        parent - xml to bind the book data to
        argContext - this context should always have list view
        userEmail - email of the user currently logged in
